definitions.definition: A craftsperson or company who makes and/or maintains clocks .
examples: There were hundreds of clockmakers in London during that era.

definitions.definition: God in His role as the creator of the clockwork universe .
examples: We have the great clockmaker to thank for these glorious sunrises and sunsets.

main_definition: A craftsperson or company who makes and/or maintains clocks .
secondary_definitions: ( philosophy , religion , often capitalized ) God in His role as the creator of the clockwork universe .
